original: mi 'jigs pa chen po'i rgyan gyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing ji ltar sangs rgyas gcig gi sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i sprin chen po'ang dpe thams cad kyis dper bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa chen po'i rgyan gyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing ji ltar sangs rgyas gcig gi sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i sprin chen po'ang dpe thams cad kyis dper bya ba ma yin te /
translated: the wheel of the great sun of pristine consciousness, the wheel of the great lamp of pristine consciousness for all wandering beings without exception, the wheel of the Dharma of the ornaments of the great fearlessnesses, and the great cloud of the wheel of the Dharma of the blessings of the body of a single buddha.

original: de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar skra'i rtse mo'i mthar nas rnam par phye ba chags pa med pa ma lus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma dang /
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar skra'i rtse mo'i mthar nas rnam par phye ba chags pa med pa ma lus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma dang /
translated: In this way, all the dharmadhatu, the entire limitless space, from the tip of a hair to the end, is divided into limitless particles, and in each of those, in a single instant of mind equal to the number of particles in an inexpressible number of inexpressible numbers of buddha realms,üîΩ

original: sems kyi skad cig ma re re de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sprul pa dang / ji srid du mtha' ma'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re ba de snyed de snyed kyi dbur gyur pa'i bar du sngar kun tu brjod pa bzhin du dbu re re la /
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig ma re re de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sprul pa dang / ji srid du mtha' ma'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re ba de snyed de snyed kyi dbur gyur pa'i bar du sngar kun tu brjod pa bzhin du dbu re re la /
translated: In this way, in every instant of mind, as numerous as the atoms in an anabhilƒÅpyƒÅnabhilƒÅpya of buddha realms, he emanates that many nirmƒÅ·πáakƒÅya buddha bodies of all the tathƒÅgatas, and in each of those buddha bodies he emanates that many heads, and in each of those heads he emanates that many tongues, and with each of those tongues he praises each of the tathƒÅgatas with that many eulogies, and he does so for as many eons as there are atoms in an anabhilƒÅpyƒÅnabhilƒÅpya of buddha realms.

original: de snyed de snyed kyi ljags su gyur pa'i ljags re re la de snyed de snyed kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung dang / sku dang / gsung 'jug ste /üîΩchos @290b kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams na go bar byed pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra dang / gsung re res de snyed de snyed kyi mdo sde rnams 'chad de /
analyzed: de snyed de snyed kyi ljags su gyur pa'i ljags re re la de snyed de snyed kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung dang / sku dang / gsung 'jug ste / chos @290b kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams na go bar byed pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra dang / gsung re res de snyed de snyed kyi mdo sde rnams 'chad de /
translated: For each of those tongues, there are that many aspects of melodious speech, and for each of those, there are that many bodies, and for each of those, there are that many voices.

original: mdo sde re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos ston pa rjes su 'brang la chos ston pa re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang / 'byed pa'i brjod pa 'gro ste /
analyzed: mdo sde re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos ston pa rjes su 'brang la chos ston pa re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang / 'byed pa'i brjod pa 'gro ste /
translated: Each voice explains that many sutras, and each sutra teaches that many dharmas, which are followed by that many Dharma words and expressions.

original: chos kyi tshig dang / 'byed pa re res chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sgra gsal bar byed cing sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la go bar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'dzer ba'ang med /
analyzed: chos kyi tshig dang / 'byed pa re res chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sgra gsal bar byed cing sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la go bar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'dzer ba'ang med /
translated: Each Dharma word and expression makes the sound of the entire realm of reality resound and makes it understood by the entire realm of sentient beings, yet the Tathagata's speech is not exhausted.

original: nyams pa'ang med /üîΩzad pa'ang med /
analyzed: nyams pa'ang med / zad pa'ang med /
translated: There is no decline,üîΩno exhaustion,

original: dams pa'ang med de /
analyzed: dams pa'ang med de /
translated: and no diminution.

original: de ltar tha ma'i mthar bskal pa'i bar du gnas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /
analyzed: de ltar tha ma'i mthar bskal pa'i bar du gnas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /
translated: In this way, they remain until the end of time, turning the wheel of the Dharma.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos lnga pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos lnga pa'o //
translated: This is the fifth quality of the blessed buddhas, abiding in the splendor of the power of the great might of the buddhas.

original: gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u'i rgyun dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u'i rgyun dang ldan zhing /
translated: ‚ÄúMoreover, the blessed buddhas, who possess the stream of the auspicious knot of the mind,üîΩand who are held by the great vajra essence, having gone to the foot of the Bodhi tree,

original: rdo rje'i snying po chen pos bzung ba de dag byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs pa rnams la bzhag nas sems can thams cad snyed kyi bdud sdig can gyi sde gzugs sna tshogs bskrad cing mi sdug pa /
analyzed: rdo rje'i snying po chen pos bzung ba de dag byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs pa rnams la bzhag nas sems can thams cad snyed kyi bdud sdig can gyi sde gzugs sna tshogs bskrad cing mi sdug pa /
translated: overcome the various forms of the armies of the evil MƒÅras, who are as numerous as all sentient beings, and manifest the forms of the most terrifying,

original: mchog tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs /
analyzed: mchog tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs /
translated: most frightening,

original: 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs pa'i gzugs /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs pa'i gzugs /
translated: and most terrifying of all worlds.

original: mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i gzugs su 'phrul @291a *//üîΩpar byed do //
analyzed: mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i gzugs su 'phrul @291a *//üîΩpar byed do //
translated: They manifest the forms of the most sublime generation of mind.

original: byang chub kyi shing mchog gi drung du song nas chos thams cad kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthar bdud kyi mi sdug pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa; skrag pa chen pos 'jigs pa chen por byed pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi shing mchog gi drung du song nas chos thams cad kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthar bdud kyi mi sdug pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa; skrag pa chen pos 'jigs pa chen por byed pa /
translated: He went to the foot of the supreme Bodhi tree and saw the entire realm of phenomena, the limits of space, and the forms of the terrifying demons, who were causing great fear and terror.

original: 'gro ba thams cad 'joms pas /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad 'joms pas /
translated: They were destroying all beings.

original: 'jig rten thams cad 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad 'jig pa'o //
translated: They were destroying the entire world.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs nas thams cad la gzigs te /üîΩgzigs nas mi bsnyengs /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs nas thams cad la gzigs te / gzigs nas mi bsnyengs /
translated: The Thus-Gone One went to the foot of the Bodhi tree and looked at all of them.

original: bag mi tsha /
analyzed: bag mi tsha /
translated: He looked at them without being discouraged.üîΩHe looked at them without being afraid.

original: spu 'ga' yang mi g-yo /
analyzed: spu 'ga' yang mi g-yo /
translated: Not a single hair on his body quivered.

original: gzugs sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'ang mi mnga'/
analyzed: gzugs sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'ang mi mnga'/
translated: He did not have any of the various signs of various forms.

original: sems phra mo'ang mi mnga' bar gnas te mi g-yo /
analyzed: sems phra mo'ang mi mnga' bar gnas te mi g-yo /
translated: He was without a subtle mind. He was still and unmoving.

original: mi bskyod mi 'gyur rnam par mi rtog /
analyzed: mi bskyod mi 'gyur rnam par mi rtog /
translated: He was unshakable, unchanging, and nonconceptual.

original: shin tu rab tu zhi /üîΩbsnyengs shing ba spu ldang ba shin tu mi mnga'/
analyzed: shin tu rab tu zhi / bsnyengs shing ba spu ldang ba shin tu mi mnga'/
translated: He was extremely peaceful.üîΩHe was without fear and without goosebumps.

original: 'dod pa dang / khong khro ba shin tu mi mnga'/
analyzed: 'dod pa dang / khong khro ba shin tu mi mnga'/
translated: He was without desire and anger.

original: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byams pa chen po chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis gtong ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byams pa chen po chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis gtong ba /
translated: He was the one who performed the deeds of the Buddha through the power of his great love and nonattachment.

original: dbang po sbed cing thugs rje chen po la gnas pa /
analyzed: dbang po sbed cing thugs rje chen po la gnas pa /
translated: He was the one who concealed his senses and remained in great compassion.

original: bag mi tsha ba'i thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i snying po thugs mi dngangs shing zil gyis mi non pa'i thugs kyis bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde mang po sna tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bzung nas zil gyis gnon /
analyzed: bag mi tsha ba'i thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i snying po thugs mi dngangs shing zil gyis mi non pa'i thugs kyis bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde mang po sna tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bzung nas zil gyis gnon /
translated: He was the one who, with a mind that was fearless and unfazed, with a mind that was unbreakable and unperturbed, and with a mind that was unconquerable and unoverpowered, overpowered and subdued all the mƒÅras, the gods of the mƒÅra class, and the entire multitude of the mƒÅras.

original: bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ste /
analyzed: bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ste /
translated: Having been subdued, they went for refuge in the TathƒÅgata.

original: de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'phrul @291b gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba bstan te /
analyzed: de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'phrul @291b gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba bstan te /
translated: The Blessed One taught them the three miracles and the taming of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
translated: They became irreversible from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They were:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos drug pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos drug pa'o //
translated: The sixth quality is that the buddhas, the transcendent conquerors, abide in the splendor of the power of their great buddha powers.

original: gzhan yang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyis khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'jug cing de dang / de dag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par rig cing sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra de ri la thogs pa med de /üîΩri rab lhun po la mi thogs /
analyzed: gzhan yang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyis khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'jug cing de dang / de dag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par rig cing sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra de ri la thogs pa med de / ri rab lhun po la mi thogs /
translated: Moreover, the speech of the buddhas is unimpeded. It pervades all the worlds without exception and is cognized by all the worlds in those places. The sound of the TathƒÅgata is unimpeded by mountains.üîΩIt is not impeded by Mount Meru.

original: rin po che'i ri la ma yin /
analyzed: rin po che'i ri la ma yin /
translated: It is not impeded by precious mountains.

original: khor yug dang / khor yug chen po la ma yin /
analyzed: khor yug dang / khor yug chen po la ma yin /
translated: It is not impeded by the outer ring of mountains or the great outer ring of mountains.

original: lha'i gnas la ma yin /üîΩklu'i gnas la ma yin /
analyzed: lha'i gnas la ma yin / klu'i gnas la ma yin /
translated: It is not impeded by the abodes of the gods.üîΩIt is not impeded by the abodes of the nƒÅgas.

original: gnod sbyin gyi gnas la ma yin /üîΩdri za'i gnas la ma yin /üîΩlha ma yin gyi gnas la ma yin /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi gnas la ma yin / dri za'i gnas la ma yin / lha ma yin gyi gnas la ma yin /
translated: It is not impeded by the abodes of the yak·π£as.üîΩIt is not impeded by the abodes of the gandharvas.üîΩIt is not impeded by the abodes of the asuras.

original: nam mkha' lding gi gnas la ma yin /üîΩmi'am ci'i gnas la ma yin /
analyzed: nam mkha' lding gi gnas la ma yin /üîΩmi'am ci'i gnas la ma yin /
translated: It is not impeded by the abodes of the garu·∏ças.üîΩIt is not impeded by the abodes of the kinnaras.

original: mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i gnas la lta zhing chags par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i gnas la lta zhing chags par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not become attached to the abodes of humans and non-humans.

original: gal te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs na'ang mi chags te /
analyzed: gal te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs na'ang mi chags te /
translated: Even if he goes to all the worldly realms, he is not attached.

original: 'jig rten srid pa'i khams thams cad kyi sgra chen po dang 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgra sna tshogs rab tu rdzogs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pas brjod pa'i sgras bsgribs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'jig rten srid pa'i khams thams cad kyi sgra chen po dang 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgra sna tshogs rab tu rdzogs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pas brjod pa'i sgras bsgribs par 'gyur te /
translated: The great sounds of all the worldly realms and the various sounds of all the worlds are completely perfected there, and are obscured by the sound of the TathƒÅgata's speech.

original: ji ltar 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna bas rnam par @292a *//
analyzed: ji ltar 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna bas rnam par @292a *//
translated: As he trains sentient beings, they are cognized by the ears of those to be trained.

original: rig ste / gang 'di rna bas rnam par rig cing rnam par rig pa'i tshig dang / 'byed pa nyams par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rig ste / gang 'di rna bas rnam par rig cing rnam par rig pa'i tshig dang / 'byed pa nyams par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The words that are cognized and distinguished by the ears are not lost.

original: de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra /
translated: It is like this: the sound of the TathƒÅgataüîΩshines,

original: lham me / lhan ne /
analyzed: lham me / lhan ne /
translated: shines brightly,

original: lhang nge'o // 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs la gnas pa'i chos kyi sgra bdun pa'o //
analyzed: lhang nge'o // 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs la gnas pa'i chos kyi sgra bdun pa'o //
translated: and shines clearly. This is the seventh sound of the Dharma of the glorious power of the great power of the Buddha Bhagavats.

original: gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du shin tu yongs su sbyangs pas chags pa med /
analyzed: gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du shin tu yongs su sbyangs pas chags pa med /
translated: Furthermore, the minds of the blessed buddhas are unattached, because they have been thoroughly refined for inexpressibly inexpressible hundreds of thousands of sextillions of eons.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan dang ldan zhing rnyog pa med pa dang / bdag gi med pa'i chos thams cad la gnas pa /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan dang ldan zhing rnyog pa med pa dang / bdag gi med pa'i chos thams cad la gnas pa /
translated: They are endowed with the ornaments of all the buddhas of the past, present, and future, are free of turbidity, and abide in all phenomena that are devoid of self.

original: nang dang / phyi dang ldan pa ma yin /
analyzed: nang dang / phyi dang ldan pa ma yin /
translated: They are not associated with the inner and the outer.

original: ma skyes pa la brtsam pa thams cad rnam par phye ba /
analyzed: ma skyes pa la brtsam pa thams cad rnam par phye ba /
translated: They are the opening of all undertakings in the unborn.

original: zhi ba / gnas med pa /
analyzed: zhi ba / gnas med pa /
translated: They are peace, without abode.

original: rtsom pa sna tshogs thams cad med pa /
analyzed: rtsom pa sna tshogs thams cad med pa /
translated: They are the absence of all kinds of undertakings.

original: ngo bo thams cad rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes la gnas pa 'gag pa /
analyzed: ngo bo thams cad rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes la gnas pa 'gag pa /
translated: They are the cessation of the conceptual perceptions of all essences.

original: rang bzhin 'od gsal ba /
analyzed: rang bzhin 'od gsal ba /
translated: They are naturally luminous.

original: shin tu yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: shin tu yongs su dag pa /
translated: They are utterly pure.

original: rtsom pa dang / yid la byed pa thams cad la ma chags pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes su song ba /
analyzed: rtsom pa dang / yid la byed pa thams cad la ma chags pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes su song ba /
translated: It is the absence of afflictions, being unattached to all compositions and mental engagements. It is the domain of all phenomena.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang bral zhing dag pa /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang bral zhing dag pa /
translated: It is the limit of reality, free from attachment and pure.

original: chos kyi dbyings ston pa'i mthar song ba /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ston pa'i mthar song ba /
translated: It is the ultimate teaching of the dharmadhƒÅtu.

original: chos kyi dbyings @292b kun tu mi zad pa'i rjes su song ba /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings @292b kun tu mi zad pa'i rjes su song ba /
translated: It is the ultimate attainment of the inexhaustible dharmadhƒÅtu.

original: 'du shes su gyur pa thams cad dang / tshad dang / tshad med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / mngon par smra ba thams cad 'gags pa dag gis lam brjod du med pa'i mtha'i yul mi zad cing chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyi mtha'i sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: 'du shes su gyur pa thams cad dang / tshad dang / tshad med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / mngon par smra ba thams cad 'gags pa dag gis lam brjod du med pa'i mtha'i yul mi zad cing chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyi mtha'i sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing 'jug pa dang /
translated: It is the ultimate destination of the path, the inexhaustible and unattached dhƒÅtu, which is the domain of the inexpressible limit, and the destination of all perceptions, all measurements and immeasurable things, all conditioned and unconditioned things, and all expressions.

original: stobs bcu'i rgyan dang / chos thams cad rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: stobs bcu'i rgyan dang / chos thams cad rnam par dag pa /
translated: It is the ornament of the ten powers and the purity of all phenomena.

original: thabs mkhas pa la zhugs pas chos sna tshogs dang / chos du ma dang / chos thams cad dang / ston pa 'gal ba med pa /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa la zhugs pas chos sna tshogs dang / chos du ma dang / chos thams cad dang / ston pa 'gal ba med pa /
translated: He is skilled in the various teachings, the many teachings, all teachings, and the noncontradictory teachings.

original: dus gsum du dbyer med pa /
analyzed: dus gsum du dbyer med pa /
translated: He is inseparable from the three times.

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i dbang gi pha rol tu song ba /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i dbang gi pha rol tu song ba /
translated: He has perfected the power of all phenomena, all dharmadhƒÅtus, and all things that are unreal.

original: chos thams cad kyi dbang gi 'byung gnas kyi mdzod kyi khyad par chos thams cad kyi tshul dran zhing kun nas gti mug pa zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i dbang dang / rgya mo'i phyogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi mdo /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi dbang gi 'byung gnas kyi mdzod kyi khyad par chos thams cad kyi tshul dran zhing kun nas gti mug pa zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i dbang dang / rgya mo'i phyogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi mdo /
translated: He is the treasury of the power of all phenomena. He is the one who remembers the way of all phenomena. He is the one who is completely free from delusion. He is the one who goes to all fields. He is the one who has the power of all the directions. He is the one who is not in the ten directions.

original: med bcu rdul yab la mi gnas pa /
analyzed: med bcu rdul yab la mi gnas pa /
translated: He is the one who is not in the dust.

original: brtan par gnas shing mi 'pho ba /
analyzed: brtan par gnas shing mi 'pho ba /
translated: He is the one who is stable and does not move.

original: ye shes kyi lta ba chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi lta ba chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa /
translated: He is the one who has the view of wisdom that is the culmination of all phenomena.

original: zag pa thams cad yongs su zad cing zag pa med pa /
analyzed: zag pa thams cad yongs su zad cing zag pa med pa /
translated: He is the one who has exhausted all defilements and is without defilements.

original: sems rnam par grol ba /
analyzed: sems rnam par grol ba /
translated: He is the one whose mind is liberated.

original: shes rab rnam par grol ba /
analyzed: shes rab rnam par grol ba /
translated: He is the one whose wisdom is liberated.

original: shin tu rnam par grol ba /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par grol ba /
translated: He is completely liberated.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mi zad pa'i mchog chags pa med par gnas pa /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mi zad pa'i mchog chags pa med par gnas pa /
translated: He is the supreme, inexhaustible limit of reality, abiding without attachment.

original: rtag tu mnyam pa dang rab tu ldan pa /
analyzed: rtag tu mnyam pa dang rab tu ldan pa /
translated: He is always in union with the state of evenness.

original: @293a *// dus gsum la chags pa med par gnas pa /
analyzed: @293a *// dus gsum la chags pa med par gnas pa /
translated: He abides without attachment to the three times.

original: sems kyi skad cig ma la dus gsum gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad ma lus par rab tu shes pa ste /
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig ma la dus gsum gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad ma lus par rab tu shes pa ste /
translated: In a single instant of mind, he knows all the activities of the minds of the three times without exception.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i stobs brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i stobs brgyad pa'o //
translated: This is the eighth power of the blessed buddhas, the power that abides in the splendor of the power of great might.

original: gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku dang / lus gcig tu 'dus pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku dang / lus gcig tu 'dus pa /
translated: ‚ÄúMoreover, the dharmakƒÅya of the blessed buddhas is a single, unified body.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang / yul tshad med pa mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i sku yongs su grub pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang / yul tshad med pa mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i sku yongs su grub pa /
translated: It is the body of all buddhas, the body that is the accomplishment of the infinite, limitless field.

original: 'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i sku /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i sku /
translated: It is the body that completely holds all worlds.

original: khams gsum gyis mi gos pa'i sku /
analyzed: khams gsum gyis mi gos pa'i sku /
translated: It is the body that is unstained by the three realms.

original: rkyen gyi sku rnam par rig cing lhag pa'i bsam pas rjes su dran pa la byin gyi rlabs kyi sku'i tshogs ston pa /
analyzed: rkyen gyi sku rnam par rig cing lhag pa'i bsam pas rjes su dran pa la byin gyi rlabs kyi sku'i tshogs ston pa /
translated: the body of blessings that is revealed by the recollection of the body of conditions with higher motivation,

original: mi bden mi rdzun zhing mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i sku /
analyzed: mi bden mi rdzun zhing mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i sku /
translated: the body of the purity of the equality of the unreal and the unmistaken,

original: 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa'i chos kyi sku 'dus pa /
analyzed: 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa'i chos kyi sku 'dus pa /
translated: the body of the Dharma that is not coming or going,

original: 'dus ma byas shing 'jig pa med pa'i sku /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas shing 'jig pa med pa'i sku /
translated: the body that is uncompounded and indestructible,

original: mtshan nyid gcig dang; mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig dang; mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku /
translated: the body that is the essence of the Dharma of the single characteristic and the absence of characteristics,

original: yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku /
analyzed: yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku /
translated: the body that does not dwell in a place or a direction,

original: tshogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku /
analyzed: tshogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku /
translated: the body of the entire complete assembly,

original: sangs rgyas khyu mchog rnam par sprul pa'i sku /
analyzed: sangs rgyas khyu mchog rnam par sprul pa'i sku /
translated: the body of the emanations of the supreme bull among buddhas,

original: kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sku /
analyzed: kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sku /
translated: the body of infinite colors,

original: sku thams cad rjes su 'brang ba /
analyzed: sku thams cad rjes su 'brang ba /
translated: the body that follows all bodies,

original: sku sna tshogs su rnam par rig pa /
analyzed: sku sna tshogs su rnam par rig pa /
translated: the body that is aware of the various bodies,

original: chos kyi sku'i tshul gyi rjes su song ba /
analyzed: chos kyi sku'i tshul gyi rjes su song ba /
translated: the body that is in accord with the way of the body of the Dharma,

original: mtha' yas par @293b snang ba'i ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod kyi sku /
analyzed: mtha' yas par @293b snang ba'i ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod kyi sku /
translated: and the body that is the treasury of the ma·πá·∏çala of the essence of infinite wisdom.

original: bya ba sna tshogs med pa /üîΩchos thams cad kyi dbyings ston pa'i sku /
analyzed: bya ba sna tshogs med pa / chos thams cad kyi dbyings ston pa'i sku /
translated: It is not a variety of actions.üîΩIt is the body that teaches the realm of all phenomena.

original: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la khyab par gsal ba'i sku 'dus pa /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la khyab par gsal ba'i sku 'dus pa /
translated: It is the body that pervades the entire realm of sentient beings.

original: mi g-yo // mi sems pa'i sku rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mi g-yo // mi sems pa'i sku rnam par dag pa /
translated: It is the body that is pure, unmoving, and without thought.

original: med pa dang / med pa ma yin pa dang / tshul dang / tshul ma yin pas phye ba'i sku /
analyzed: med pa dang / med pa ma yin pa dang / tshul dang / tshul ma yin pas phye ba'i sku /
translated: It is the body that is distinguished by what is and is not, and by what is and is not proper.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su song zhing 'dul ba'i sku /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su song zhing 'dul ba'i sku /
translated: It is the body that is in accord with the various faiths of all sentient beings and that trains them.

original: 'gags pa dang / 'gags pa ma yin pa 'dul ba la gzigs pa'i yon tan dkon mchog thams cad byung ba bsgreng ba'i sku /
analyzed: 'gags pa dang / 'gags pa ma yin pa 'dul ba la gzigs pa'i yon tan dkon mchog thams cad byung ba bsgreng ba'i sku /
translated: It is the body that is the source of all the precious qualities of the view that trains in what is and is not blocked.

original: chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / de bzhin nyid bsdus pa'i sku /
analyzed: chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / de bzhin nyid bsdus pa'i sku /
translated: It is the body that includes all phenomena and suchness as the Dharma of the Buddha.

original: rang bzhin gyis shin tu zhi ba dang / bsgribs pa med pa'i mtha'i sku /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis shin tu zhi ba dang / bsgribs pa med pa'i mtha'i sku /
translated: It is the body that is naturally very peaceful and that is the limit of the absence of obscurations.

original: thogs pa med pa'i chos thams cad las skyes pa'i sku /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa'i chos thams cad las skyes pa'i sku /
translated: It is the body that arises from all phenomena that are unobstructed.

original: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba /
analyzed: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba /
translated: It is the body that is in accord with everything.

original: chos kyi dbyings dag pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dag pa /
translated: the pure realm of phenomena,

original: 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i sku /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i sku /
translated: the body that is distinguished in all worlds,

original: brtsam pa las mi ldog pa /
analyzed: brtsam pa las mi ldog pa /
translated: the body that does not turn back from its undertakings,

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i ye shes thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i ye shes thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba /
translated: the body that follows the wisdom of all the liberations of the buddhas,

original: kun 'brang ba'i rjes su song ba'i sku ste /
analyzed: kun 'brang ba'i rjes su song ba'i sku ste /
translated: and the body that has gone beyond all that is to be known.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku 'dus pa dgu pa'o //üîΩgzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i ye shes rnam par chad pa de bzhin gshegs @294a *//
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku 'dus pa dgu pa'o // gzhan yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i ye shes rnam par chad pa de bzhin gshegs @294a *//
translated: This is the ninth assembly of the buddhas‚Äô Dharma body, the power of the splendor of the great power of the blessed buddhas.

original: pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba /
analyzed: pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba /
translated: ‚ÄúMoreover, the blessed buddhas are equal and have the wisdom of equality. They are the tathƒÅgatas who have arisen from all the bodhisattva activities

original: spyod pa las mngon par byung ba /
analyzed: spyod pa las mngon par byung ba /
translated: and have emerged from those activities.

original: smon lam gyi khyad par dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa; byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye shes bya ba sna tshogs med pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba /
analyzed: smon lam gyi khyad par dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa; byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye shes bya ba sna tshogs med pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba /
translated: the conduct that arises from all the buddhas and all bodhisattva conduct,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa thams cad kyi cho ga shes pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa thams cad kyi cho ga shes pa /
translated: the knowledge of the conduct of all the conduct of the ocean of bodhisattva conduct,üîΩthe great aspiration,

original: smon lam chen po dang / spyod pa mi chung ba /
analyzed: smon lam chen po dang / spyod pa mi chung ba /
translated: the conduct that is not small,

original: spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dka' ba ma yin pa /
analyzed: spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dka' ba ma yin pa /
translated: the conduct that is not difficult to perfect,üîΩthe conduct that arises from all the conduct that is difficult to bear with strength,

original: spyod pa'i stobs bzod par dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad las byung zhing spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: spyod pa'i stobs bzod par dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad las byung zhing spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag pa /
translated: the conduct that is pure of all conduct,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bzang po spyad pa mi 'bri bar spyod pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bzang po spyad pa mi 'bri bar spyod pa /
translated: the conduct that does not diminish the good conduct of the bodhisattvas,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa thams cad la gnas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa thams cad la gnas pa /
translated: the conduct of all the buddhas abiding in all the immeasurables of meditative absorption,

original: spyod yul mtha' yas pa lam thams cad ston pa /
analyzed: spyod yul mtha' yas pa lam thams cad ston pa /
translated: He is the teacher of all paths in the infinite range of experience.

original: lam ma yin pa'i yul dang / lam thams cad la zhugs pa /
analyzed: lam ma yin pa'i yul dang / lam thams cad la zhugs pa /
translated: He is the one who has entered all paths, both those that are paths and those that are not.

original: ye shes mchog gi stobs kyi chog shes pa /
analyzed: ye shes mchog gi stobs kyi chog shes pa /
translated: He is the one who is satisfied with the power of supreme wisdom.

original: 'dzem pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo 'bebs pa /
analyzed: 'dzem pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo 'bebs pa /
translated: He is the one who turns the wheel of Dharma without hesitation.

original: dge ba 'dri ba dang / mi 'dri ba dang / btsun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa'i ye shes mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes shin tu yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: dge ba 'dri ba dang / mi 'dri ba dang / btsun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa'i ye shes mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes shin tu yongs su dag pa /
translated: He is the one who has the wisdom of equality and the wisdom of complete purity, which are the teachings of the way of the holy Dharma for those who ask about virtue and for those who do not.

original: lus dang / @294b ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa gsum yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: lus dang / @294b ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa gsum yongs su dag pa /
translated: He is the one who has completely purified the three actions of body, speech, and mind.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sgo ma rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas song ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / mdzad pa thams cad la zhugs pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sgo ma rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas song ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / mdzad pa thams cad la zhugs pa /
translated: He is the one who has entered the lineage of all the tathƒÅgatas, the wisdom of the buddhas, and all the activities of the buddhas, without finding the door of the buddhas and by means of the conduct of the buddhas.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa /
translated: He is the one who abides in omniscience.

original: tshad med par ston pa dag gnas pa /
analyzed: tshad med par ston pa dag gnas pa /
translated: He is the one who abides in the teaching of the immeasurable.

original: rtsa ba med cing mtha' med pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
analyzed: rtsa ba med cing mtha' med pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
translated: It is the inconceivable wisdom of all the superknowledges, which are rootless and endless.

original: ye shes 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba /
analyzed: ye shes 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba /
translated: It is the wisdom that follows the minds of worldly beings.

original: 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi thams cad chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mthong ba dang / phra ba ma lus pa mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i ye shes /
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi thams cad chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mthong ba dang / phra ba ma lus pa mtha' dang / dbus med pa'i ye shes /
translated: It is the wisdom that sees all phenomena of all beings without exception.

original: dus gsum thams cad la 'jug pa'i tshul dang phra ba'i ye shes rjes su rtogs pa /
analyzed: dus gsum thams cad la 'jug pa'i tshul dang phra ba'i ye shes rjes su rtogs pa /
translated: It is the wisdom that realizes the subtle wisdom that engages with the three times in a way that is without end or middle.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don dang / ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad par brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don dang / ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad par brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang ldan zhing /
translated: It is the wisdom that is endowed with the purification of all worlds without exception, with the supramundane meaning, with the wisdom, and with the inexpressible deeds of the buddhas in all worlds.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku /
translated: It is the wisdom of the irreversible body of all the buddhas.

original: grangs la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi chos yi ge med par rab tu rtog pa /
analyzed: grangs la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi chos yi ge med par rab tu rtog pa /
translated: the wisdom that engages with numbers, which is the discernment of the Dharma without letters,

original: brjod du med pa'i ye shes sna tshogs rnam par phye ba dang / yi ge thams cad brjod du med par shes par byed /
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i ye shes sna tshogs rnam par phye ba dang / yi ge thams cad brjod du med par shes par byed /
translated: the wisdom that is beyond expression, which is the differentiation of the various aspects of wisdom, and the wisdom that knows all letters to be inexpressible.

original: ye shes kyi dge bar spyod pa'i chos thams cad rnam par dag pa kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi rim @295a *//
analyzed: ye shes kyi dge bar spyod pa'i chos thams cad rnam par dag pa kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi rim @295a *//
translated: the wisdom of the stages of Samantabhadra, which is the purity of all the virtuous Dharmas of wisdom,

original: pa; sems skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes ji ltar 'os pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / ji ltar skye mched kyi chos gtong bar rab tu yid la byed pa'i ye shes chos thams cad kyi yul gyi mtshams ma yin pa /
analyzed: pa; sems skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes ji ltar 'os pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / ji ltar skye mched kyi chos gtong bar rab tu yid la byed pa'i ye shes chos thams cad kyi yul gyi mtshams ma yin pa /
translated: the wisdom that is endowed with a single instant of mind, which is the wisdom that comprehends all Dharmas, the wisdom that is suitable for all, and the wisdom that is the mental focus on the bodies of all sentient beings and the relinquishment of the phenomena of the sense sources.

original: 'jig rten gyi yul khams ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mthong ba'i yul de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i yul la 'jug cing thams cad 'dul ba'i yul ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi yul khams ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mthong ba'i yul de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i yul la 'jug cing thams cad 'dul ba'i yul ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su
translated: the entire world, all beings, all sentient beings, the entire realm of phenomena, and the single instant of mind of the three times, and the object of the wisdom vision of the tathƒÅgatas, the object of the appearance of the buddhas, the object of the entire training of all,

original: song ba / rnam par dag par sangs rgyas kyi yid kyi mtshams su thob pa mngon par mkhyen cing yul thams cad las mngon par sangs rgyas pa; sems can gyi sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lus pa thams cad rtogs pa /
analyzed: song ba / rnam par dag par sangs rgyas kyi yid kyi mtshams su thob pa mngon par mkhyen cing yul thams cad las mngon par sangs rgyas pa; sems can gyi sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lus pa thams cad rtogs pa /
translated: the object of the attainment of the pure mind of the buddhas, the object of the manifest buddhahood of all, and the object of the realization of the mind and mental consciousness of all sentient beings.

original: dus gsum gyis phye ba'i sems kyi skad cig ma la ye shes kyi rjes su sangs rgyas shing mtshams ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas pa /üîΩsems can thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi @295b khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang / dus gsum thams cad du 'gro ba dpag tu med pa dang /
analyzed: dus gsum gyis phye ba'i sems kyi skad cig ma la ye shes kyi rjes su sangs rgyas shing mtshams ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas pa / sems can thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi @295b khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang / dus gsum thams cad du 'gro ba dpag tu med pa dang /

analyzed: de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtha' dang / dbus med par gnas pa /
translated: There are the blessed buddhas who abide without center or periphery,üîΩthe buddhas who abide without center or periphery in the form of the supreme leader,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du mtho ris su skye ba rnam par dag pa so sor thob par mdzad pa dang /

translated: As soon as the blessed buddhas see sentient beings, they quickly find the light of each and every one of them and, without being discouraged,

translated: O son of the victorious ones,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu ste /

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: chos thams cad kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs dang / sems gcig gi spyod pa dang / rnam par g-yo ba ldog pa sems kyi skad cig ma la mkhyen pa dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dus gsum kun gyi las rnams dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs dang / sems gcig gi spyod pa dang / rnam par g-yo ba ldog pa sems kyi skad cig ma la mkhyen pa dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dus gsum kun gyi las rnams dang /
translated: the tathagatas know the entire realm of phenomena, the various minds of all sentient beings of the three times, the conduct and movements of a single mind, and the reversal of mental instants. They know the karma of all sentient beings of the three times, the various karmic results of all sentient beings, the various faculties of all sentient beings, the various inclinations of all sentient beings, the various aspirations of all sentient beings, and the various paths of all sentient beings.

original: las dang ldan pa sna tshogs dang / rnam pa dang / rim pa dang / las rnams kyi 'phel zhing gsog pa'ang phyi ma'i rnam par smin pa'i rim pa sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /
analyzed: las dang ldan pa sna tshogs dang / rnam pa dang / rim pa dang / las rnams kyi 'phel zhing gsog pa'ang phyi ma'i rnam par smin pa'i rim pa sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /
translated: the various karmic actions, their aspects, their stages, and the increase and accumulation of karmic actions, and the stages of their future ripening, all in a single instant of mind;üîΩthe entire realm of phenomena,

original: sems can gyi ris sna tshogs dang / sems can gyi ris gcig dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad dus ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul zhing ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang /
analyzed: sems can gyi ris sna tshogs dang / sems can gyi ris gcig dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad dus ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul zhing ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang /
translated: the various classes of sentient beings, the single class of sentient beings, and all sentient beings without exception, and the way to guide and teach sentient beings in accordance with the time, and the knowledge of the display of the miracle of teaching, the miracle of instruction, and the miracle of miracles through blessings.

original: chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / rgya mo'i phyogs kyi ris thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyis @298b mtshan mar bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba lta ba rnam par phye ba mkhyen pa dang /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / rgya mo'i phyogs kyi ris thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyis @298b mtshan mar bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba lta ba rnam par phye ba mkhyen pa dang /
translated: It is to know the entire realm of phenomena, the entire range of the sky, and all world systems. It is to know the characteristics that are held in the minds of all beings, and to know the distinctions in the view of the buddhas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / dad pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du skad cig la tshad med pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas la lta ba dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / dad pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du skad cig la tshad med pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas la lta ba dang /
translated: It is to know how to see the buddhas in a single instant, in an immeasurable way, in accordance with the thoughts, faith, and discipline of the beings in all world systems without exception.

original: rnam par rig pa'i byin gyis brlabs mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can pha rol gyi bsam par sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad 'dzin pa med pas sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba bzhin du 'doms shing rjes su bstan pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par rig pa'i byin gyis brlabs mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can pha rol gyi bsam par sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad 'dzin pa med pas sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba bzhin du 'doms shing rjes su bstan pa dang /
translated: the knowledge of the blessings of consciousness, the knowledge of the display of the blessings of the buddhas in the minds of all sentient beings in all the worlds without exception, and the knowledge of the instructions and teachings of the buddhas to sentient beings in accordance with their training, without grasping at the entire realm of phenomena,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bston par mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gro zhing sems kyi skad cig ma la de dang / de dag tu 'gro ba'i nan tan mkhyen pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bston par mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gro zhing sems kyi skad cig ma la de dang / de dag tu 'gro ba'i nan tan mkhyen pa dang /
translated: the knowledge of the display of the appearance of the tathƒÅgatas, and the knowledge of the practice of going to all the realms of phenomena and all sentient beings in a single instant of mind.

original: sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi phyogs thams cad la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gtong zhing sbyor ba mkhyen pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi dad pa tshad med pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku la lta ba dang /üîΩgzugs kyi sku'i kha dog gi gnas mtha' yas @299a *//
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi phyogs thams cad la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gtong zhing sbyor ba mkhyen pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi dad pa tshad med pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku la lta ba dang / gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog gi gnas mtha' yas @299a *//
translated: In a single instant of mind, they know how to look at the body of the buddhas in accordance with the immeasurable faith of all beings in the entire realm of phenomena.

original: pa ston pa mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: pa ston pa mkhyen pa ste /
translated: They know how to display the infinite colors of the form body.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu'o //
translated: These are the ten abodes of omniscience of the Tathagatas, the Arhats, the Completely Enlightened Ones.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste /
translated: The thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas have ten immeasurable and inconceivable buddha samƒÅdhis.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:üîΩThe blessed buddhas are always absorbed in samƒÅdhi with respect to all phenomena, and in a single instant of mind they teach the Dharma to all sentient beings throughout the entire realm of phenomena.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la sems can gyi khams sna tshogs kyi rim pa bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa kun nas snang bar mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la sems can gyi khams sna tshogs kyi rim pa bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa kun nas snang bar mdzad pa dang /
translated: The blessed buddhas are absorbed in samƒÅdhi with respect to the entire realm of phenomena, and in a single instant of mind they illuminate the various stages of the realms of sentient beings, which are devoid of self and reach the end of existence.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma'i mtha' la snyoms par 'jug cing gnas pa dang; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa med bcu rdul yab thams cad kyi rgya mo thams cad dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma'i mtha' la snyoms par 'jug cing gnas pa dang; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa med bcu rdul yab thams cad kyi rgya mo thams cad dang /
translated: The blessed buddhas are absorbed in the entire realm of phenomena and in all three times, and they remain absorbed in the limit of the instant of mind.üîΩThe blessed buddhas are always absorbed in the entire realm of phenomena and in all the atoms of all buddha realms, and they remain absorbed in the inexhaustible limit of all buddha realms.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / zhing thams cad la rtag @299b tu snyoms par zhugs shing zhing mi zad pa'i mthar gyur par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par rig pa ston pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / zhing thams cad la rtag @299b tu snyoms par zhugs shing zhing mi zad pa'i mthar gyur par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par rig pa ston pa dang /
translated: The blessed buddhas are absorbed in the entire realm of phenomena and in the infinite bodies of the buddhas, and they manifest the various bodies of the buddhas in all worlds in an instant.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su gsal ba la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing /üîΩsems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs kyi gnas mdzod du gnas shing skad cig la dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar gyur pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems yongs su gsal ba la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing / sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs kyi gnas mdzod du gnas shing skad cig la dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar gyur pa dang /
translated: The blessed buddhas are always absorbed in the samƒÅdhi of the complete illumination of body, speech, and mind throughout the entire realm of phenomena.üîΩThey abide as the treasury of the various minds of all sentient beings and, in a single instant, they engage with the minds of all beings in accordance with their faith. The blessed buddhas are absorbed in the samƒÅdhi of the nature of all phenomena throughout the entire realm of phenomena and they have reached the end of freedom from attachment.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rkyen la snyoms par 'jug cing skad cig la smra ba'i rkyen ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rkyen la snyoms par 'jug cing skad cig la smra ba'i rkyen ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /
translated: The blessed buddhas are absorbed in the samƒÅdhi of the conditions of all phenomena throughout the entire realm of phenomena and all worlds, and they reveal the conditions of speech in a single instant. The blessed buddhas are absorbed in the samƒÅdhi of the complete illumination of the body of all phenomena throughout the entire realm of phenomena and all worlds, and they reveal the complete illumination of the body in a single instant.

original: 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa med bcu rdul yab thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la mtha' yas pa'i rkyen gyi rjes su song ba ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa med bcu rdul yab thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la mtha' yas pa'i rkyen gyi rjes su song ba ste /
translated: They are always in equipoise on all the worlds and beyond the worlds, and in a single instant they follow infinite conditions.

original: sangs rgyas la lta ba mi gcod cing @300a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas la lta ba mi gcod cing @300a *//
translated: They never cease to behold the buddhas,üîΩand they behold the infinite buddhas in sentient beings.

original: sems can sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la lta bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad bsgrub pa med pa la snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs shing rig nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnyes
analyzed: sems can sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la lta bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad bsgrub pa med pa la snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs shing rig nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnyes
translated: The blessed buddhas are in equipoise on the entire realm of phenomena, which is without accomplishment, and in a single instant they realize and know all the qualities of buddhahood and attain the perfection of the infinite liberation of the buddhas.

original: pa ste / kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: pa ste / kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O son of the conquerors!

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o //
translated: These are the ten boundless and inconceivable buddha samƒÅdhis of the bhagavƒÅn buddhas, the tathƒÅgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO jinaputras!

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu ste /
translated: The bhagavƒÅn buddhas have ten kinds of liberation.

original: bcu gang zhe na; rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na; rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /
translated: What are the ten? They are the liberation that manifests the appearance of the manifestation of the arising of inexpressibly inexpressible buddhas in a single atom; the liberation that manifests the appearance of the turning of the wheel of the Dharma in a single atom;

original: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i zhing ston pa rnam par thar @300b pa dang /
analyzed: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i zhing ston pa rnam par thar @300b pa dang /
translated: the liberation that displays the training and ripening of beings, inexpressibly inexpressible, in a single atom; the liberation that displays inexpressibly inexpressible buddhafields in a single atom;

original: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung zhing brje ba rnam par thar pa dang /
analyzed: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung zhing brje ba rnam par thar pa dang /
translated: the liberation that displays the arising of buddhas in the past, present, and future in a single atom; the liberation that displays the past, future, and present in a single atom;

original: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par sprul pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /
analyzed: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par sprul pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /
translated: In one atom, they display the miracles and emanations of all the tathƒÅgatas of the past, present, and future.üîΩIn one atom, they teach the Dharma to all the sentient beings of the past, present, and future.

original: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ston pa rnam par thar pa ste /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ston pa rnam par thar pa ste /
translated: In one atom, they display the names of all the buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O son of the victors!

original: 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu'o //
analyzed: 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu'o //
translated: These are the ten liberations of the blessed buddhas.

original: snyan gyi gong rgyan rgyas pa chen po'i mdo le'u 'bum pa las /
analyzed: snyan gyi gong rgyan rgyas pa chen po'i mdo le'u 'bum pa las /
translated: From the MahƒÅvaipulya S≈´tra of the Ornament of the Topknot of the Ears,

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u nyi shu dgu pa rdzogs so //
